news_header: An extensive investigation into financial crimes related to the Icon real estate group has revealed damages of approximately EUR 9.5 million affecting around 300 investors.
news_text: The Police of O.bothnia have concluded a thorough investigation into financial crimes linked to the Icon real estate group, which has been ongoing since autumn 2019. The investigation involved eight suspects accused of serious offenses, including fraud and accounting violations, and has resulted in financial damages estimated at EUR 9.5 million. Approximately 300 investors were affected, and the investigation has produced a substantial amount of evidence, totaling 15,500 pages over nearly five years. The case has now been forwarded to the prosecutor, marking a significant challenge in the career of investigator Tn Nisilä.
